message: Also, trying to create a topic called "/" or "\" causes coke kitteh to say blarg
Someone created a topic called "1" in the TechCrunch group and it seems to be causing unexpected behavior
viz., it appears oddly in the groups dropdown, trying to go to it via the groups dropdown caused the coke kitteh to appear
stupid minor bugs, but should probably be cleaned up at some point
and if you're in that topic and try to leave, you get a js popup about your message still being processed
(i should have mentioned above, that creating topics called \, / and & just cause an error, they don't create topics)
creating a topic called "1" seems to be a worse bug because it actually breaks other things, it doesnt' just cause an error page
